title: As much as I hate Bronzies and Shitvers...
body:
That's slack. Give them the same rewards.

The message you're sending is that people like me are somewhat righteous in that we look down on them for their perplexing lack of skill. Like, wow... they are bad and - sorry, I digress.

Give them the damn skin. The gap between Diamond and Gold is infinitely larger than the gap between Bronzies/Shitvers and Gold.

replies.body: give me a bronze jacket aka a black garbage bag with arm and neck holes in it.
it's always been this way, from season 1 onwards and as much as the maokai skin looks amazing, I accept my place as a below average bronze trash who'll never climb and has the mechanics of a potato.
below average? 80% of player base is bronze-silver. take into account that a large number of people in silver have a bronze mmr and you'll find that you're quite average....

if you're outside of that ranking, you're not average.

Oh, the usual weak mentality that is destroying children all over the world ... 

give ALL the kids a medal, even if they came last, so that they won't feel bad about themselves ... oh really .?.  maybe we should start calling "bronze" the "last winners", or "the last Challengers" .?. :/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6wOt2iXdc4

Carlin got it right ... watch all of it and learn a little something, please ... :/

well I mean you see things in bronze that you won't ever see in any other elo so I mean... but in all fairness I'm pretty sure most people who are bronze and aren't toxic little balls of arsenic accept that they aren't good enough to earn a gift skin. 

I'm bronzish and I know that I'm never really going to be able to climb. I lack mechanics, aptitude for skillshots, the endeavor to decent or meta champions, reaction times and the ability to put in the time commitment to this game required to climb. I accept that bronzish silver is my limit and I'm not really upset that players who are obviously better and put more time into this game are rewarded for that effort.

This is the lol culture. Stop complaining and git gud. Just play one champ doesn't matter what champ just stick to one champ. If you don't have the discipline to do that then u deserve to be in bronze.

Think about people who grind day after day after day with 300 Wins - 400 losses people who play 1k+ games to get to Gold + they deserve the rewards for being good continuing to strive in harder games, 

Was so Hard getting to Gold III let alone Gold! After that i sorta went nah happy where i am, i didnt play many games this year because i dont play ranked much ( i will like to next season because i like casual games) But people who play over 400+ who are Gold deserve it.. Anyway off topic 

Point is Gold seperates the good players to the better players and so on so forth. If you can Climb youll be rewarded same with Life, This aint no Communist bullshit mayneee  xD
Why reward lack of skill though? Kids needs to learn that if they want things they have to earn it.

the skin (along with the stupid borders and false notion that you're 'above" others) is a carrot on a stick. the vast majority of the player base won't get it by design. if they gave it to everybody people would grind ranked less and likely overall play less which means less $$$ for tencent.
